aid.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: help, such as money or food, given by an organization or government to a country or to people who are in a difficult situation
aid.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Foreign aid from many countries poured into the famine area.
He has been granted legal aid (=free legal services).
aid.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: help that you need to do a particular thing
aid.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: Father Poole walked painfully, with the aid of a stick.
aid.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: help or advice that is given to someone who needs it
aid.translation[0].definitions[2].exampl: I didn’t speak any French, but a nice man came to my aid.
aid.translation[0].definitions[3].defini: something such as a machine or tool that helps someone do something
aid.translation[0].definitions[3].exampl: A video is a useful aid in the classroom.
